metadata.title: CVE-2019-17014 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
If an image had not loaded correctly (such as when it is not actually animage), it could be dragged and dropped cross-domain, resulting in across-origin information leak. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 71.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17014` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 71.0+build5-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '71.0+build5-0ubuntu1').
